metadata.synopsis: A few ADs for the eponymous captured cultists to share with the gith captors as they traipse through the monastery on the way to the creche.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Remain out of sight of the guards as they accompany the cultists to the creche.

0.speaker: Burrock
0.text: Y-you can do whatever you want to us - we will stay strong in Her name!

5.speaker: Raider Add'ath
5.text: We shall see how well your faith persists.
5.context: NodeContext: "sah - varr - shh" gith for teacher

8.speaker: Warrior Ith'dul
8.text: Especially when Sa'varsh Kethk uses you as youngling target practice.
8.context: NodeContext: "sah - varr - shh" gith for teacher

2.speaker: Mahrin
2.text: Burrock... she will intercede for us, won't she? She will save us?
2.context: NodeContext: whispered desperately to another fellow captive

6.speaker: Burrock
6.text: Of course, the Absolute sees all.
6.context: NodeContext: nervous, captured by githyanki raiders

3.speaker: Raider Add'ath
3.text: Still your istik tongues, or I shall pull them from your heads.
3.context: NodeContext: "iss tick" - meaning "other" (a githyanki sluragainst non-gith)

4.speaker: Warrior Ith'dul
4.text: See, Add'ath. See how they whimper to their fledgling goddess.
4.context: NodeContext: "iss tick" - meaning "other" (a githyanki sluragainst non-gith) - whole line said in a superior fashion, your god is superior to the cultists you are taunting

7.speaker: Raider Add'ath
7.text: Foolish istik. There is only one god-queen, and she does not answer prayers.
7.context: NodeContext: "iss tick" - meaning "other" (a githyanki sluragainst non-gith) - whole line said in a superior fashion, your god is superior to the cultists you are taunting

9.speaker: Warrior Ith'dul
9.text: Best hope the captain's wolves have enough kibble, Absolutists.
